Package org.jpws.front

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContainerView
    Interface to handle general aspects of viewports to a database container's record list.

    MirrorFileManager.OperationListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutDialog
    The "About" dialog.
    ActionHandler
    Static singleton class organising actions, mainly depending on the command menus, and action related assisting routines.
    AddDialog
    Dialog class to handle display and edition of a singular PWS record (PwsRecord).
    DatabaseDialog
    Class to edit file properties such as security level, logical database name and description text.
    DatabaseHandler  
    DisplayManager
    Class to organise global display arrangements.
    ExportCSVDialog
    Dialog to perform CSV export, either for entire file or a record selection.
    FileInfoDialog
    Dialog panel to inform about various PWS file states and statistics.
    FileOpenDialog
    This file open dialog is an extention of JFileChooser which incorporates several possible file filters.
    FindTextDialog
    FindTextDialog in org.jpws.front
    Global
    Global variables and functions.
    Global.FileMemory
    Class implementing a memory of some recently used PwsFiles together with their security passwords.
    Global.FileMemory.FRec  
    Global.ProjectServiceParcel  
    GUIService
    Collection of minor GUI-oriented services like message boxes, etc.
    HistoryHandler  
    HistoryHandler.Entry  
    ImportCSVDialog
    Dialog to setup and perform a CSV import into a parameter open database (PwsFileContainer) or a file that is created new.
    JPWSIdleFrame
    TheJFrame that is active when the program is in IDLE state.
    MenuHandler
    Static singelton class to handle command menu setup and runtime administration.
    MenuHandler.MoveFileMenu  
    MenuHandler.OldStateMenu
    Sub-menu for the list of automatic backup copies of the currently active database.
    MessageDialog  
    MessageDialog.MessageContentPanel
    A JPanel for holding message display data and layout consisting of an Icon on the left side and a centered text block on the right.
    MirrorFileManager
    Class that allows automated mirroring of data files into copies or other kind of representations on a separate storage area (currently on local disk space) on a frequent basis.
    MirrorFileManager.OperationEvent  
    ObjectChangeListener
    This class is at the core of object related user activity tracing in JPWS.
    PasswordDialog
    Displays a modal password dialog box and handles user interaction with it.
    PolicyDialog
    Creates a password policy dialog box and handles user interaction with it.
    PolicyDialog.PolicyDialogPanel
    A JPanel that holds the initialised dialog components for the edition of a PwsPassphrasePolicy.
    PortableInstallDialog  
    PreferencesDialog
    Creates the preference dialog box and handles user interaction with it.
    PwsafeJ
    The "mainframe" of this application.
    PwsFileContainer
    A containment structure to deal with GUI handling of a loaded PwsFile database.
    PwsFileContainer.RecordListTransferable
    This class extends java.awt.datatransfer.Transferable of the Java Drag and Drop mechanism.
    PwsFileContainer.TransferableData
    Record structure to represent the source file data commitment for transfer.
    Reporter
    Reporter in org.jpws.front
    Service  
    Service.PwsListCompareResult
    Structure containing the results of a comparison of two PwsRecordList objects.
    ShowUIManager  
    StatusBar
    A status bar component (JPanel) with multiple separately addressable display elements.
    SystemDesktopHandler  
    TableHandler
    Defines a TableModel and organises the display of a JTable related to the content of a PwsFileContainer.
    ToolbarHandler
    Handles the application's main toolbar.
    TreeHandler
    Defines a TreeModel and organises the display of a JTree relating to the content of a PwsFileContainer.
    UndoManager
    UndoManager active for file modifications of the list display level.
    UndoManager.DeleteRecordEdit  
    UndoManager.FileEdit  
    UndoManager.HeaderEdit  
    UndoManager.ModifyPasswordEdit  
    UndoManager.ModifyRecordEdit  
    UrlLinkTable
    Discussion: An instance should issue focus-gained and focus-lost events which are equivalent to the corresponding events of the JTable instance of this UI.
